metadata.title: CVE-2023-52508 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nvme-fc: Prevent null pointer dereference in nvme_fc_io_getuuid() Thenvme_fc_fcp_op structure describing an AEN operation is initialized with anull request structure pointer. An FC LLDD may make a call tonvme_fc_io_getuuid passing a pointer to an nvmefc_fcp_req for an AENoperation. Add validation of the request structure pointer beforedereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
